title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; install via npm i ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package; use Ollama models as drop-in LLMs for chains, agents, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user); runs in Docker.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient CLI wrapper for chatting, pulling, and listing models; install via pip install ollama-cli.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + LlamaIndex for local document Q&A.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; Maven Central artifact net.ollama4j:ollama4j.

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines; spin up Ollama service containers and run model tests in parallel.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama; releases for macOS, Linux, Windows.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama’s REST API; install with nimble install ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate offering typed APIs and streaming support; cargo add ollama-rs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with both sync and async APIs; NuGet: OllamaSharp.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) with one-line docker run ollama/ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder components.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Slack bot using Socket-Mode to chat privately or in channels with any Ollama model.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: HF hub → Ollama converter script; auto-generate Modelfile and push to registry.
